note:
Progressive faith leader and fledgling economic geographer. Wyomingite by birth, Vermonter by choice, and dabbling in Canadian-ness through a PhD sojourn in Newfoundland.

Life is political and I talk about both life and politics, US and Canada side and wherever else I happen to be. Extremely anti-genocide. Covid cautious. Rural denizen for much of life, also fascinated by and a student of North America's brick cities. Sometimes speaks of sex and also the institutional church (separately).
